mapper.sql: id, email, password, role_id, is_verified, is_active
mapper.select: INSERT INTO tb_partner_account (role_id, email, password) VALUES (#{user.roleId}, #{user.email}, #{user.password}) RETURNING id, email, password, role_id, is_verified, is_active
INSERT INTO tb_merchant_account (role_id, email, password) VALUES (#{user.roleId}, #{user.email}, #{user.password}) RETURNING id, email, password, role_id, is_verified, is_active

SELECT ta.id AS id, ta.email AS email, ta.password AS password, tr.name AS role, ta.role_id AS role_id, ta.is_verified AS is_verified, ta.is_active AS is_active FROM tb_partner_account ta JOIN tb_role tr ON ta.role_id = tr.id WHERE ta.email = #{email}
